channel.title: Need help with 508 client error!
channel.description: Hi i just got compiler work to 508 servers so now i can run the servers and compile them. But the 508 did not work after i did environment variables that i did after a guide. Help! I got a server but not a working client.. Wtf should i do? How the hell can it be so hard to get a client to work. Please help and i be 100% happy and maybe make you a mod/admin on my server because i can edit server i know how. But not how to get the client work again. Please help guys! I'm so angry! Help![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2009, 08:50:45 am[/size][hr]Why can't someone help me?

item.title: Need help with 508 client error!
item.dc:creator: @masterkorv12 masterkorv12
item.description:
@masterkorv12 wrote:

thanks but it works now i found out… but when i change something in my 508 server and compiles when i play server again i have to start over everything i done with codes and the last place i visited… why does this happens when i compile and it says it compiled when i had set myself admin and logged in i wasn’t admin? wtf help!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 508 client error!
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

Try doing this in your client go to…
IM NOT SURE IF THIS WILL WORK BUT TRY IT
BTW MAKE A COPY OF YOUR RUN.BAT INCASE I MESS IT UP :o
Run>Edit (Should Be In Notepad)

Check your code is like this

@echo off
title NAME HERE
cd files
java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1
pause
